episode: I live out in the boonies where it's very dark and neighbors are very far away. A friend of mine left after telling me about shapeshifters and things that Go bump in the night and if they could look like my boyfriend and I thought it wasn't scared. After she left though the lights wouldn't come on and then I heard a bump on the roof and someone calling my name and I was terrified.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My friend got me spooked and then the lights wouldn't come on and I live out in the boonies where it's very dark and the neighbors are far away.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds super creepy.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: She got me spooked and I was alone in the dark. She had mentioned they could even take the shape of my boyfriend and would try to lure me to my death. Then I hear something on the roof and my name and suddenly my boyfriend who is supposed to be at work is standing there or is it my boyfriend?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Whoa, that's freaky!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was more scared than I can remember being in years terrified even. I asked why he was on the roof and he said he was checking why there were no lights.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: What a relief that it was really him!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Well I still was not sure my friend seemed pretty convinced she had seen shape shifters and how could I be sure it was really him?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a pretty convincing scare, I'd still be doubting too.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Luckily we have a phrase we use if one of us sends someone for something from the other one and he knew the phrase so I was relieved.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Nice, a secret code saved the day!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes  I grabbed him and hugged him and explained why I was so scared and doubtful about him being him.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Aww, sweet reunion!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The next day I told my friend and we all had a good laugh but while I was scared the terror was real.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Glad you could laugh about it later!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I told my friend I would appreciate her not sharing anymore of her scary experiences.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Fair enough, no more spooky stories!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes especially not when I am home alone at night

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Definitely don't need that kind of stress alone at night!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: If the lights would have worked I think I would have been fine.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Darkness makes everything scarier!
